text: Nine Lives of Nestor Makhno (, Devyat zhizney Nestora Makhno) is a 2005 12-part mini-series which aired on ORT Channel in Russia and RTVi,Анна Слю стала женой Батки Махно. Новости кино. an international Russian television station which is carried around the world. The movie is a historical biographical drama about the life of Nestor Makhno, a Ukrainian anarchist who was the commander of the Revolutionary Insurrectionary Army of Ukraine (Makhnovshchina).KinoPoisk The movie was directed by Nikolai Kaptan and the screenplay was written by Igor Bolgarin and Victor Smirnov. It runs for 540 minutes. A 6-disc DVD set of the series is available. ==References== ==External links== * * The Nine Lives of Nestor Makhno on archive.org Category:2005 Russian television series debuts Category:2005 Russian television series endings Category:2000s Russian television series Category:Russian television miniseries Category:Russian drama television series Category:Russian Civil War films Category:Biographical films about military personnel Category:Biographical films about military leaders Category:Channel One Russia original programming Category:Cultural depictions of Nestor Makhno
title: Nine Lives of Nestor Makhno
